title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
Title: ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black

Overview:
Boost checkout speed and accuracy with this Zebra cordless handheld area imager. Designed for retail and hospitality, it delivers fast, reliable 1D/2D barcode scanning in a lightweight, ergonomic form. The kit includes a presentation cradle for hands-free operation and a USB kit for simple, plug-and-play setup.

Key Features:
- Versatile scanning: Reads both 1D and 2D barcodes with an area imager engine for quick, accurate captures.
- Omni-directional performance: No need to align barcodes—scan from any angle to speed workflows.
- Aim line guidance: Visual aiming aid helps users target and scan faster with fewer errors.
- Cordless convenience: Enjoy handheld mobility; use the included presentation cradle for hands-free scanning at the counter.
- Ready out of the box: Pre-configured with auto-host cables for seamless, plug-and-play integration.
- Ergonomic and lightweight: Designed for all-day comfort to reduce user fatigue.
- Durable for everyday use: Built for general-purpose environments like retail checkout and hospitality front desks.

Connectivity and Power:
- Connectivity: USB cable included for simple host connection.
- Power options: Corded electric or USB cable; supports 3 x AAA batteries for cordless operation.
- Battery configuration: Uses 3 AAA batteries (noted as required; check package contents for inclusion).

Compatibility:
- Works with: Laptops and desktops.

Ideal For:
- Retail point-of-sale, price checks, inventory updates, loyalty redemption.
- Hospitality front desk, ticketing, guest services, and order pickup.

What’s in the Box:
- Cordless handheld standard range area imager (black)
- Presentation cradle
- USB cable/USB kit
- Quick start or configuration materials (pre-configured profiles)

Specifications:
- Brand: ZEBRA
- Scanner type: 1D/2D area imager
- Use case: General purpose (Retail, Hospitality)
- Design: Handheld, ergonomic, lightweight
- Features: Omni-directional scanning, aim line guidance, pre-configured profiles, auto-host cables
- Power: Corded electric/USB or 3 x AAA batteries
- Number of batteries: 3 (AAA)

Why Choose This Scanner:
Get enterprise-grade scanning without the complexity. With omni-directional reads, aim line guidance, and true plug-and-play setup, staff can start scanning in minutes and keep lines moving—all in a compact, comfortable device built for everyday retail and hospitality workflows.
